OOC: Well, at least I'll try! Lol!

Bic:

AzureBlade assumed the base was empty and went straight for the 
computer core room. He pulled out his dual cannon and loaded a cryo-
clip in it. The operation was noisy, but he didn't care.

AzureBlade: Hydras, you've went too far. Your ambitions will be the 
death of our entire race if I don't do something...

He receives a message from Windlord and acknowledges it.

AzureBlade: I got you, Windlord. I'll be there in a moment...
